survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate employee satisfaction with the telecommuting software tools provided by the company, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance remote work efficiency and user experience.

questions.question_text: Which of the following telecommuting software tools do you use regularly for work?
answer_options: Video conferencing tools (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
Cloud storage services (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Include an 'Other' option with a free-text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with checkbox options. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following telecommuting software tools do you use regularly for work?
answer_options: Video conferencing tools (e.g., Zoom, Microsoft Teams)
Cloud storage services (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video conferencing tools provided by the company?
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Video conferencing tools' is selected in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the video conferencing tools provided by the company?
script.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Video conferencing tools' is selected in Q1.

questions.question_text: What challenges have you faced while using collaboration platforms for remote work?
answer_options: Problems with integration with other tools
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if 'Collaboration platforms' is selected in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format with an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with checkbox options. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field.

questions.question_text: Please describe any additional challenges you face with telecommuting software tools not covered in previous questions.

script.question_text: Please describe any additional challenges you face with telecommuting software tools not covered in previous questions.

script.question_text: How easy is it to access technical support for telecommuting software tools?
